items.title: WATCH:  Life-threatening, record-breaking weather and temperatures across the US
items.description: There are 150 million Americans on alert ahead of the extreme heat event, meanwhile heavy rain triggered dangerous flash flooding in central New York.

items.title: WATCH:  Analyzing ‘bunker buster’ bombs in combat

items.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Iran's Khamenei says 'punishment' of Israel will continue
items.description: U.S. aircraft attacked three facilities in Iran related to the country's nuclear program on Saturday.

items.title: Top Democrat says Trump strikes on Iran a 'massive, massive gamble'
items.description: Rep. Jim Himes said it was still too soon to know if U.S. strikes against Iranian facilities had substantially weakened the country’s nuclear program.

items.title: ICE detains Marine Corps veteran's wife who was still breastfeeding their baby
